thread.title: Netflix signs up 8 million more users and stock pops

title: Netflix signs up 8 million more users and stock pops
text:
Netflix signs up 8 million more users and stock pops Monday, January 22, 2018 - 01:40 
Netflix is still on a tear, landing 8 million more binge watching subscribers in the last quarter of 2017, helping to push up the stock to another record high. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Netflix is still on a tear, landing 8 million more binge watching subscribers in the last quarter of 2017, helping to push up the stock to another record high. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DwY3Yv
